item.title: DotCIO - Tech Tip Tuesday - How do I know if my document has been printed?
item.description: How do I know if my document has been printed? You can find out by logging into Papercut using your RCS userid and password! PaperCut is a print management system to manage your print quotas, see your print history and charges and configure your system.

item.title: Dream Furiously: A Talk by Anna Anthropy | April 16
item.description: Generative AI has flooded the internet with art that is technically sound, devoid of nuance, and absent an artist’s hand or sensibilities. In other words, a perfect tool of fascism. How are artists to push back against the tide? By making aggressively bad, horny, unpalatable art. Join this virtual talk on April 16 at 4pm.

item.title: Updated Sponsored Program Close Out Policy
item.description: Research Administration and Finance (RAF) has recently updated the Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute Sponsored Program Close Out Policy to reflect recommendations resulting from a recent internal audit. The updated policy delineates in it the responsibilities of RAF, Principal Investigators and Business Administrators for closing out awards.
